summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of August 1, 2015, to August 31, 2015. It details the account balance, transactions, and service charges associated with the account.

persons.name: Philip Rntchre
persons.context: Philip Rntchre is identified as the relationship manager for the business account at Fifth Third Bank.

keyFacts: The bank statement covers the period from August 1, 2015, to August 31, 2015.
The account belongs to Shocker Holdings LLC.
The beginning balance was $149,669.35, and the ending balance was also $149,669.35.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived for this period.
The document includes contact information for business banking support.
